== Definition of mononucleosis syndrome ==
- presence of '''more than 50% of mononucleated elements'' (lymphocytes and monocytes) '''among leukocytes''' on the blood count, due to a '''hyperlymphocytosis''' '''([[Blood count interpretation SD-223|blood count interpretation]]; [[Leukocyte abnormality SD-216|leukocyte abnormality]])'''''

- '''and'''' '''≥ 10% activated lymphocytes on the blood smear ([[Prescription and analysis of blood smear SD-222|prescription and analysis of blood smear]])''''

properties.question: What are the two main criteria for diagnosing mononucleosis syndrome according to the blood count interpretation and blood smear analysis?
properties.option_a: Presence of less than 50% mononucleated elements and less than 10% activated lymphocytes
properties.option_b: Presence of more than 50% mononucleated elements and less than 10% activated lymphocytes
properties.option_c: Presence of more than 50% mononucleated elements and ≥ 10% activated lymphocytes
properties.option_d: Presence of exactly 50% mononucleated elements and ≥ 10% activated lymphocytes
